channel.title: Comments on: Successful Web App Requirements

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/16/successful-web-app-requirements/#comment-4203">julien51</a>.
I'm trying out the <a href="http://www.andersnoren.se/teman/hemingway-wordpress-theme/" rel="nofollow">Hemingway theme</a>. I like the large text.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

I’m trying out the Hemingway theme. I like the large text.

item.description: Hey, not related, but the new design is awesome :)

item.title: By: Stephane Daury
item.dc:creator: Stephane Daury
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/16/successful-web-app-requirements/#comment-4201">Joseph Scott</a>.
Nope, just far enough. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Scott.

Nope, just far enough. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/16/successful-web-app-requirements/#comment-4200">Stephane Daury</a>.
Definitely. And there is a time and a place for the extra stuff, usually after you have made sure other people like the taste of the cake. Perhaps I am taking this metaphor too far now :-)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stephane Daury.

Definitely. And there is a time and a place for the extra stuff, usually after you have made sure other people like the taste of the cake. Perhaps I am taking this metaphor too far now ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Stephane Daury
item.dc:creator: Stephane Daury
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/16/successful-web-app-requirements/#comment-4199">Joseph Scott</a>.
It's like sprinkles on a cake. They're nice to have, if you're into this sort of things, but they're not what makes the cake. Or what will save you if you don't have a proper recipe in mind. :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Joseph Scott.

It’s like sprinkles on a cake. They’re nice to have, if you’re into this sort of things, but they’re not what makes the cake. Or what will save you if you don’t have a proper recipe in mind. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2014/04/16/successful-web-app-requirements/#comment-4198">Stephane Daury</a>.
Easy to get caught up in the extra stuff.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Stephane Daury.

Easy to get caught up in the extra stuff.
